question:
The Panama Canal:
1. connects the Atlantic Ocean in the east and Pacific Ocean in the west
2. has lock system to lift up the ships above the sea level for transit
3. has reduced the distance between New York (east) and San Francisco (west) by 13,OOOkm
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: All the statements are correct in this question. Please look into wikipedia on how these locks work.
